moves.4. Bxc6 dxc6 5. O-O Bd6: Have to protect the pawn. Bg4 also works...
moves.6. Nc3 Bg4 7. h3 Bxf3 8. Qxf3 Qf6: Trading queens would be okay right now.
moves.9... O-O-O: Castling queen side is nice. I also get my rook on the d-file.
moves.11. Na4 Bb4 12. a3 Ba5 13. Nc5 Qe5: Not very efficient but it gives the knight a boot. B4 looks a bit scary on afterthought...
moves.18. Qg4+: Only way to avoid mass material loss.
moves.18... Qxg4 19. hxg4 Nf6: I activate my knight. White resigned.
